item.description:
We round out the year with our annual meeting, pot-luck dinner, and winter solstice party.

We'll start with a pot-luck dinner at 7:30 PM. The winter solstice party will follow a brief annual meeting and election of officers for the 2010 calendar year at 8:00 PM, and will include a silent auction, music from Mickey Koth and her friends, and a short talk by P.J. Deak entitled "Observations of Hope: Charles Dickens in America, 1842."

Please bring a dish to share for the pot-luck dinner. Items for the silent auction would also be appreciated.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so you can use meetup's RSVP system get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll most likely be in the social hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Annual Meeting and Winter Solstice Party
